A opening_name specifies a descriptive title, which may be assigned to a Building_element_component.
the value door_opening indicates that the Opening is in a wall that it is intended to provide access from one side of the wall to the other and may be filled with a door.
the value service_opening indicates that the Opening is in a wall, floor, or roof that it is intended to allow service elements to pass through the wall, floor, or roof.
the value window_opening indicates the Opening is in a wall or roof to admit light and usually to provide visual access through the wall or roof.
An opening_type specifies a descriptive label that indicates the form or function of the Opening. The value is either user defined or predefined.

A Building_element_component is the volume of the shape of a object that can play a functional role. A Building_element_component is either a Positive_component or a Negative_component. A column consists of the components shaft, brackets, and openings.

A Negative_Component is a type of Building_element_component that is a portion of a and represents a volume of space; it is a volume that is empty space rather than solid material. A Negative_component may be one of the following:
Recess;
Opening.
The shape of a Negative_component is of concern only where it intersects a Positive_component. A Negative_component in a wall could be a door opening. The relationship between the Negative_component (the door_opening) and the Positive_component (the wall) is the same as if the shape of the Negative_component were subtracted using a solid boolean operation from the shape of the Positive_component.

An Opening is a type of Negative_component that passes through a and serves a functional purpose. An Opening would be left in a wall or slab for plumbing or air conditioning ducts. The data associated with an Opening are the following:
the opening_type specifies a descriptive label that indicates the form or function of the Opening. The value is either user defined or predefined.

A Positive_component is a type of Building_element_component that represents a solid volume. A Positive_component in a wall could be a window sill. The relationship between the Positive_component representing the sill and the Positive_component representing the wall is the same as if the shape of the Positive_component representing the sill were added to the Positive_component representing the wall using a boolean operation.
the component_functional_type specifies a descriptive label that indicates, whether the Positive_component is the main component of the .
A Recess is a type of Negative_component that does not pass through a . An alcove or niche in a wall are recesses.
